title: the_sword_in_the_stone_(disney)
body:
The Sword in the Stone is a 1963 American animated musical fantasy comedy film produced by Walt Disney and released by Buena Vista Distribution. It is based on the novel of the same name by T. H. White, first published in 1938 and then revised and republished in 1958 as the first book of White's Arthurian tetralogy The Once and Future King. Directed by Wolfgang Reitherman, the film features the voices of Rickie Sorensen, Karl Swenson, Junius Matthews, Sebastian Cabot, Norman Alden, and Martha Wentworth. It was the last animated film from Walt Disney Productions to be released in Walt Disney's lifetime.

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia : The Sword in the Stone (1963 film)":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Sword_in_the_Stone_(1963_film)

title: caipirinha_(meme)
body:
A dance [[meme]] from the 2000s with various characters from different series. Their actions consist of wagging their finger and shaking their hips, to the tune of a Japanese trance remix of German artist Carinho's song, appearing on [[EXIT TRANCE]] PRESENTS ウマウマできるトランスを作ってみた2 作者は病気シリーズ, under the name "ぷんちきぱやっぱーヾ(ﾟ∀ﾟ)ﾉ♪ ([i]punchiki-payappaa[/i])."

This action sequence was done in one of the scenes from the series [[Azumanga Daioh]], where [[Takino Tomo]] is berating [[Mihama Chiyo]] for being childish.

In Brazil, Caipirinha is a national cocktail, made with cachaça, sugar and lime.

h4. See also

* [[Caipirinha DearS dance (meme)|]]: a 2020s meme featuring a new dance with the same song
* [[meme]]
* [[leekspin (meme)|]]
* [[paffendorf]]
* [[caramelldansen]]
other_names: ぷんちきぱやっぱーヾ(_゚∀_゚)ノ♪

title: caramelldansen
body:
A [[sweden|Swedish]] dance/techno song by Caramell. The song's title translates to [i]The Caramel Dance[/i].

The song spread quickly on the Internet, after a sped-up version by DJ Speedycake was paired with a dancing [[Mai (popotan)|]] and [[Mii (popotan)|]] from [[Popotan]] in a Swedish-made fan-edited flash video (post #113333), which was later reposted to Nico Nico Douga. The dance is called "ｳｯｰｳｯｰｳﾏｳﾏ(ﾟ∀ﾟ) ([i]U-u-uma uma[/i])" or "ウマウマダンス ([i]Uma uma dance[/i])" in Japan, spreading even further there following [[Exit Tunes]] obtaining the rights to the song from the original producers, releasing the original and sped-up remix to great success.

The vast majority of posts under this tag reference the visual part of the flash, which comes from the opening animation of the Popotan game and has nothing to do with the Caramell song. Interestingly however, later on, Caramell (or rather their producers) did put out follow-up music videos of the song featuring anime/manga inspired personas, known as the [[Caramella Girls]], doing the dance, with the exact same tempo as the original edit.

h4. See also

* [[meme]]
* [[Leekspin (meme)|]]
* [[Caipirinha (meme)|]]
* [[Paffendorf]]
* [[Get Down (meme)|]]
* [[Un tan]]
other_names: ウッーウッーウマウマ(゚∀゚)
ウーッウーッウマウマ

title: barusamiko_(exit_tunes)
body:
One of the many [[Exit Tunes]] mascot characters, appearing mainly on their [[Exit Trance]] album covers. Was among its larger mascots, having her own merch and even her own "Twitter":[https://twitter.com/barusa_miko]. She also appears in [[Lucent Heart]].

Named after one of the Japanese misheard lyrics to [[Caramelldansen]]; in the chorus, the first line goes "Dansa med oss. Klappa era händer," but it was misheard as "バルサミコ酢 (Barusamiko-su), やっぱいらへんで (Yappa irahen de)". She appears on the "Exit Trance PRESENTS ウマウマできるトランスをつくってみた (Uma Uma Dekiru Trance wo Tsukutte Mika)" album series, similarly named after the misheard lyrics in Caramelldansen. She's also on the cover of the album "EXIT TRANCE PRESENTS ウマウマできるトランスを作ってみた2 作者は病気シリーズ", which features the remix of the song [[Caipirinha (meme)|]] that also became a meme.

Loosely inspired the original design of one of the [[Caramella Girls]], [[Nadine (caramella girls)|]].

* !post #9376442

title: hanasaki_miyabi_(5th_costume)
body:
The 5th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[Holostars]]' [[Hanasaki Miyabi]], revealed as part of his 100,000 subscribers milestone celebration. It is inspired by [[Little Red Riding Hood (fairy tale)|]] and comes as a pair with [[Kishido Temma]]’s [[Kishido Temma (4th Costume)|4th costume]] due to their shared fantasy theme and being revealed on the same day. 

It includes a [[hooded cloak|hooded]] [[red cloak]] with [[floral print]] and [[gold trim]], and fixed with a [[yellow bow]], [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]] worn with [[bolo tie]], [[green vest]], [[green pants|green]] [[pinstripe pants]], [[brown belt]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[lace-up boots]]. Attached to his belt are a [[book holster]] and a [[holstered]] [[handgun]]. He wears a [[thigh strap]], [[leaf hair ornament|leaf]] [[hairclip]] and [[glasses]] with [[eyewear strap]]. 
He has [[braided bangs]] in this costume. There’s also a [[stuffed wolf]] on his shoulder called "Lupin". 

It has an [[alternate color]] variation where his [[white hair|hair]] and [[white cloak|cloak]] turns white, originated from a "tweet":[https://twitter.com/miyabihanasaki/status/1673237565972054017] showing the color change due to a bug in his model. 

h4. Appearance

* !post #5221336: Profile
* !post #8095657: Merchandise

title: mulan_(movie)
body:
Mulan is a 1998 animated film produced by [[Disney]] based on the Chinese legend of Hua Mulan. The film takes place during the Han dynasty, where [[Fa Mulan (disney)|Fa Mulan]], daughter of aged warrior Fa Zhou, impersonates a man to take her father's place during a general conscription to counter a Hun invasion.

h4. External links

* "Mulan (1998 film)":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mulan_(1998_film)]

title: hanasaki_miyabi_(7th_costume)
body:

title: kishido_temma
body:
A [[virtual youtuber|VTuber]] and member of [[Holostars]] from the second batch, [[SunTempo]]. Designed by [[Shiramine (srmn09)|]].

He has a princely appearance with [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] and [[blue eyes]]. While his model has him as a rather slender man, he's strong enough to [[princess carry]] his [[Astel Leda|genmate]] around or carry [[Kageyama Shien]] on his shoulders, and he also has a black belt in [[karate]].

Has a pet named [[Hiyamaru]] (ひや丸) who is a 2-year-old female [[ferret]], and a [[greatsword]] called "Tenken Yozora".

title: tinkerichi

title: peter_pan_(novel_character)
body:
Titular character of the British story [i][[Peter Pan (novel)|]][/i]. Partner is the fairy [[Tinker Bell (novel character)|]] and rival is [[Captain Hook]].

A mischievous, functionally immortal young boy who lives on the island of Neverland. While he is adventurous and serves as leader of his group of "Lost Boys", he is also somewhat immature and forgetful to the point of completely forgetting a person if they've been gone long enough or died. He has the ability to fly while his shadow is still attached to him; without it, he's flightless. Likes hearing stories, and it's partially the reason why he takes [[Wendy Darling]] and her [[john_darling|two]] [[michael_darling|brothers]] to Neverland with him.

Known around London for crowing like a rooster on the rooftops at night and taking babies that have been out of their crib for more than a week. Depending on the adaptation, Peter can look like small child or an early adolescent.

title: claude_frollo_(disney)
body: Judge Claude Frollo is the main villain of [[The Hunchback of Notre Dame (Disney)|]]. A cruel judge motivated by pride and lust, he considers himself a righteous and holy man, even as he commits acts of horrendous evil against the Roma and others that he looks down upon. He develops a lustful obsession for [[Esmeralda (Disney)|]] which puts him in conflict with his ward and bellringer [[Quasimodo (disney)|]].

title: cheese_song_(meme)
body:
"Cheese Song" is a song featured in the seventh part of the [[JoJo's Bizarre Adventure]] series, [[Steel Ball Run]]. It is written, composed, and sung by [[Gyro Zeppeli]] during the fifth stage of the [[Steel Ball Run]] race.

Gyro makes up the "Cheese Song" on the spot, offering to sing it to [[Johnny Joestar|Johnny]] after [[Johnny Joestar|Johnny]] suggests that they take a break at a barn so they could plan how they will cross the Mississippi. [[Johnny Joestar|Johnny]] is surprised about Gyro's nonchalance, but agrees to hear it when Gyro complains. After singing it, Gyro excitedly asks Johnny what he thinks. Johnny sarcastically praises it excessively, calling it a masterpiece that gets stuck in one's head easily and will be a hit in Europe. Gyro agrees and asks Johnny if he can transcribe the tune into sheet music. As they enter the barn, Gyro continues singing "Rella rella rella rella." Johnny continues with "Zola zola zola zola" and asks Gyro if he wants to form a band.

title: tell_him_to_go_eat_shit_johnny_(meme)
body: Meme from part 7 of [[Jojo's Bizarre Adventure]], [[Steel Ball Run]]. In this meme [[Gyro Zeppeli]], smiling, asks [[Johnny Joestar]] to say: Tell [[Hot Pants (sbr)|him]] to go eat shit. But [[Johnny Joestar|Johnny]] tells him to say it himself.

title: help:upload_rules
body:
All uploads to Danbooru are subject to the following upload rules. Uploads that break these rules may be deleted.

h6. Prohibited Content

You may not upload any of the following to Danbooru:

* [[Off-topic]] content (see below).
* Poorly drawn content.
* [[Paid reward]]s.
* Commercially licensed anime or manga.
* Real [[photo (medium)|]]s of any person under the age of 18.
* Works containing [[third-party watermark]]s (unless the unwatermarked picture is not available anywhere).
* Works [[upscaled]] or [[downscaled]] by third parties, including [[Waifu2x]] upscales (unless the original picture is not available anywhere).
* Hard translations to non-English languages ([[hard-translated (non-english)]]). The only exception is posts for which the original is not available anywhere.
* [[Third-party edit]]s that substantially alter the content of the image, such as [[nude filter]]s, [[headshop]]s, [[fake translation]]s, or meme or joke edits.
* Low effort or unoriginal memes, such as [[motivator (meme)|]]s (if not done by the original artist).
* Fully [[AI-generated]] art with no human input aside from prompting.

h6. Off-Topic Content

Danbooru is primarily for anime-style or anime-related artwork. "Anime-related" is a broad term that includes anime, manga, videogames, original artwork, and other similar material.

The following things are considered off-topic:

* Real life pornographic photos or videos, such as Western porn actresses or Japanese [[JAV]] idols.
* Real life photos that have nothing to do with anime, manga, or videogames.
* Low effort or unoriginal memes.

h6. Borderline Content

The following things are not strictly against the rules, but they have a much higher chance of being deleted than normal. Uploaders should be careful about uploading these things, and approvers should be careful about approving them.

* Extreme fetish content. This includes extreme [[guro]], [[scat]], [[bestiality]], [[vore]], "hyper" fetishism (monstrously large body parts), [[diaper]] fetishism, and other extreme or unusual fetishes.
* [[AI-assisted]] content. This includes works that were initially generated by AI but were considerably retouched by human effort.
** If you are unsure if your post qualifies as either [[AI-generated]] or [[AI-assisted]], you can try asking in topic #22285.
* Explicit [[furry]] content.
* [[3D]] porn or SFM porn.
* [[Cosplay photo]]s.
* [[Hard-translated]] comics.
* [[Anime screenshot]]s.
* [[Third-party edit]]s not in the "Prohibited Content" section above.
* [[Duplicate]]s.
* [[Bad anatomy]].

h4. See also

* [[help:community rules]]
* "Terms of Service":/terms_of_service

title: elina_(barbie)
body:
The protagonist of [[Barbie: Fairytopia]] and its sequels. She is a wingless fairy who was gifted a pair of wings at the end of the first movie by [[The Enchantress (barbie)|]] for saving Fairytopia. In the sequel [i]Fairytopia: Mermaidia[/i], she ends up transforming into a [[mermaid]] in order to save her friend Prince Nalu. In the third movie, she becomes the apprentice of Azura to perform the Flight of Spring. [[Bibble]] is her puffball companion.

title: barbie_as_the_island_princess
body:
An 3D animated movie released in 2007 starring [[Barbie (character)|]]. In it, Barbie portrays the protagonist [[Rosella (barbie)|Ro]], a girl who grew up alone on an island after being shipwrecked as a child. She ends up returning to human civilization when a sailing ship discovers the island while exploring.

title: piers_(pokemon)
body:
[b]Piers[/b], known as [b]Nezu[/b] (ネズ) in Japan, is a character introduced in [i][[pokemon swsh|Pokémon Sword and Shield]][/i].

This Galar Gym Leader who loves Dark-type Pokémon is also a well-known singer and songwriter. Many of his fans were charmed by his melancholic vocal quality.

He has [[pale skin]], [[green eyes]] with [[grey eyeshadow]], and [[long hair|long]] [[two-tone hair|two-tone]] [[black hair|black]] and [[white hair]] with [[hair over one eye|bangs over one eye]]. He wears a [[shirt]] under a [[cropped jacket|cropped]] [[white jacket]], a [[belt]], [[mismatched gloves]], [[bike shorts]], and [[boots]].

h4. Official Art

* !post #9375340: Concept Art

The Hunchback of Notre Dame is a 1996 animated film by [[Disney]] based on Victor Hugo's [[the hunchback of notre dame (novel)|novel of the same name]]. The plot centers on [[Quasimodo (disney)|]], the deformed bell-ringer of Notre Dame and his struggle to gain acceptance into society.

title: puppet
body:
A [[doll]] of cloth or wood, which can be operated by a puppeteer by means of strings and cable or by wearing it as a glove.

If it's controlled with [[puppet strings]], it's a [[marionette]].

Some puppets have proper names like [[Shanghai Doll]] or [[Pinocchio (disney character)|]].

title: tangled
body:
A 2010 animated [[Disney]] film loosely based on the Brothers Grimm fairy tale [[Rapunzel (fairy tale)|]]. The film is about a young princess, [[Rapunzel (Disney)|]], with [[absurdly long hair]] who yearns to leave her secluded tower. Against her mother's wishes, she accepts the aid of a handsome intruder to take her out into the world which she has never seen.

Not to be confused with [[entangled]].

title: snow-white_and_rose-red
body:
A fairy tale collected by Grimm Brothers about two titular sisters, [[Snow-White (Snow-White and Rose-Red)|Snow-White]] and [[Rose-Red (Snow-White and Rose-Red)|Rose-Red]], who first offered a bear to stay with them through winter and later had some trouble with a mean dwarf.

This Snow-White (ger.: Schneeweißchen) is not to be confused with the much more well-known [[Snow White (fairy tale character)|]] (ger.: Schneewittchen), titular heroine of a tale about girl living with seven dwarves, who was poisoned by an apple.

title: ruby_rose
body:
Ruby Rose is the protagonist of [[RWBY]], a 3DCG series produced by Rooster Teeth. 

Ruby is the "R" in RWBY, and is associated with the color red. Her character design is inspired by [[Little Red Riding Hood (fairy tale character)|]]. [[Yang Xiao Long]] is her half-sister. She likes cookies, drinks milk, and has a cheerful disposition.

h4. Abilities 

She wields a large [[scythe]]/[[gun]] hybrid weapon named [[Crescent Rose]], a "High-Caliber Sniper-Scythe" (HCSS). Her symbol is a [[rose]], and red [[rose petals]] appear when she uses her speed semblance (special ability).  

When in the presence of [[grimm (rwby)|]], her eyes are able to glow brightly with a silvery light. When this ability is used, any [[grimm (rwby)|]] in front of this light will be turned to dust or petrified, depending on how large the grimm is; very strong ones may be able to partially resist the effect.

h4. Physical characteristics 

Ruby has [[grey eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[two-tone hair|two-toned]] [[gradient hair|gradient]] [[red hair]]/[[black hair]], or black with red streaks. 

In earlier volumes of the series, she stood 5'2" tall (including boots). As of Volume 7, she is 5'4" tall.

h4. Attire 

She is usually seen in a [[red cape|red]] [[cape]] or [[hooded cloak]] secured with [[cross]]-shaped pins. Her default outfit includes a [[long sleeves|long sleeved]] [[black dress]] (with red [[frilled dress|frills]]) tied with a [[corset]], [[black pantyhose]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[knee boots]] with red [[lace-up boots|laces]]. Her [[belt]] is a [[bandolier]] with large [[bullet]] [[cartridge|cartridges]].  Most of her oufits include a [[rose]]-shaped badge somewhere on them.

Her Beacon [[school uniform]] consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[blouse]] with [[neck ribbon]], brown [[blazer]], and [[plaid skirt]], plus her customary red cape.  

h4. External links

* "RWBY Wikia: Ruby Rose":https://rwby.wikia.com/wiki/Ruby_Rose

body:

title: big_bad_wolf
body:
An archetypal fairytale character, describing a fictional [[wolf]], generally portrayed as the antagonist in the stories they appear in, whether as an embodiment of evil, a moral corrupter, an predator, etc. Likely inspired by the risk of wolf attacks in centuries past.

The most famous iteration of the Big Bad Wolf comes from [[Little Red Riding Hood (fairy tale)|]], but big bad wolves aren't unique to it nor Grimm's Fairy Tales in general (ex. the English fable the [[Three Little Pigs]]). Use this tag for generic depictions of fairytale big bad wolves only, tagged with the relevant fairytale tag if they are meant to represent any one in particular, with more distinct iterations of the archetype being given their own tags instead.

h4. External links

* Wikipedia: "Big Bad Wolf":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Bad_Wolf]

title: marble_zone
body: Marble Zone is the second Zone in the original Sonic the Hedgehog and its numerous ports and remasters. Located on South Island, the bulk of the stage is set inside an ancient, underground dungeon with several traps that include lava pools and spikes. Occasional outdoor sections feature open fields and grassy platforms on lava that sink when stepped on, briefly burning them. As with other stages in the game, Marble Zone has three Acts, with the third concluding in a boss fight against [[Dr. Eggman]] in the Egg Scorcher.

title: falco_(sonic)
body:
Falco is an enemy that appears in the [[Sonic the Hedgehog (series)|]]. It is a mass-produced falcon-based Badnik created by [[Dr. Eggman]].

The Falco bears a great resemblance to the Egg Hawk during the [[Neo Metal Sonic]] incident. During the Sol Dimension incident, they are colored blue and resemble another bird Badnik.

This was the outfit she wore in [[Rojiura Satsuki: Chapter Heroine Sanctuary]], which has a grey plaid skirt beneath a black corset, and a white halterneck. Here, she is the fifth Golden Heroine called [b]CCC 48 Red Lancer[/b], and represents the Dragon in the Chinese zodiac. In [[Fate/Grand Order]], she wears this outfit during the Orleans and Septem Singularity storylines.

In Rojiura Satsuki, she has checkered horn ribbons matching her skirt, but in Fate/Grand Order, she has the same purple horn ribbons as her first ascension.

title: skin_tight
body:
Clothing that is extremely form-fitting. 

Skin tight clothing usually leaves no space between the skin and the clothing. Common examples include [[bodysuit]]s, [[leotard]]s, [[swimsuit]]s, sportswear, and other clothing made of [[spandex]], [[latex]], or other tight stretchable materials. Often, the clothing is so tight that [[cameltoe]], [[covered nipples]], [[covered abs]], or [[covered navel]]s are visible.

See [[tight clothes]] for regular clothing that is tight, but not skin tight. See [[impossible clothes]] for clothing that is unrealistically skin tight, especially around the chest.

Yagyuu has [[long hair|long]] [[white hair]] tied into [[twintails]] with [[shuriken]]. title: national_guard_of_ukraine
body:
The National Guard of Ukraine (NGU; Ukrainian: Національна гвардія України, НГУ, romanized: Natsionalna hvardiia Ukrainy [nɐt͡s⁽ʲ⁾ioˈnɑlʲnɐ ˈɦʋɑrd⁽ʲ⁾ijɐ ʊkrɐˈjinɪ], abbr. NHU [ɛn ɦɛ u]) is the Ukrainian national gendarmerie and internal military force. It is part of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, responsible for public security. Originally created as an agency under the direct control of the Verkhovna Rada on 4 November 1991, following Ukrainian independence, it was later disbanded and merged into the Internal Troops of Ukraine in 2000 by President Leonid Kuchma as part of a "cost-saving" scheme. Following the 2014 Revolution of Dignity, amidst the Russian intervention, the National Guard was re-established, and the Internal Troops were disbanded.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Guard_of_Ukraine

title: pepsiman_(game)
body:
A 1999 [[PlayStation 1]] endless runner videogame developed by KID (Kindle Imagine Develop), the creators of [[Memories Off]]. In the game, the players control [[Pepsiman]], the Japanese mascot of [[Pepsi]], where he travels to four different locations in the US ([[San Francisco]], [[New York City]], [[Texas]] and the fictional Pepsi City), where he solves various crisis that involves Pepsi. Despite being a Japanese release only game, the game is spoken in English and includes several live action cut scenes featuring Canadian actor Mike Butters who praises the player for completing a stage while also drinking cans of Pepsi. 

Despite being only available in Japan and low sales, the game gained a international cult following years later thanks to the game's absurd premise, is consider a predecessor of [[Temple Run]] and being a good Advergame.

title: intrepid_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the US Navy carrier USS [i]Intrepid[/i] (CV-11). Character design by [[Shibafu_(glock23)|]], voiced by [[Kubota Hikari]]. 

She is portrayed with [[short_hair|short]] [[brown hair]] tied into a [[ponytail]], [[blue eyes]], and [[large breasts]]. Her default outfit consists of a [[grey dress]], [[black jacket|black]] [[cropped jacket]] with an aviator's [[neck pillow]], [[blue neckerchief]] with her real-life [[camouflage]] pattern (Measure 32-D3A), [[grey socks]], and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[rudder footwear]]. 

Her [[rigging]] consists of her real-life bridge, funnel, and [[radar]] masts to her back, and her [[flight deck]] to her left. Like other US carrier shipgirls, she brandishes a firearm to "launch" her aircraft, in this case an [[M1903 Springfield]] [[rifle]] with two 12.7 cm twin [[anti-aircraft gun|DP mounts]] on top. 

h4. Skins

* !post #3029966: Base
* !post #3029962: [[Intrepid Kai (kancolle)|Kai]]
* !post #8643219: [[Intrepid (new year) (kancolle)|New Year]]
* !post #3792120: [[Intrepid (mitsukoshi) (kancolle)|Mitsukoshi collab]]

Her introduction into the game on the morning (Japan time) of February 22, 2018 drew mixed reactions from Western fans with the negative side taking issue with her design which is not helped by her artist's [[shibafu_(glock23)_(style)|already notorious art style]]. Her first appearance and the negative initial reactions coincided with the temporary suspension of the game's Twitter account that day, leading some Western fans to connect the perceived rage against Intrepid's design to the suspension (which was actually for unrelated reasons). In comparison, the Japanese fanbase was much more receptive for Intrepid's design with the initial negative reactions being lukewarm.

h4. See also

* [[Intrepid (Azur Lane)]]
* [[Intrepid (Warship Girls R)]]
* [[USS Intrepid (CV-11)]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: USS [i]Intrepid[/i] (CV-11)":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_Intrepid_(CV-11)]
* "Intrepid Sea-Air-Space Museum website":https://www.intrepidmuseum.org/

title: intrepid_(azur_lane)
body:
The personification of the aircraft carrier USS [i]Intrepid[/i] (CV-11) in [i][[Azur Lane]][/i]. Character design by [[Xiao Chichi]], voiced by [[Fairouz Ai]].

Intrepid has [[grey eyes]] and [[grey hair]] tied into a [[two side up]]. She wears a uniform of similar design to Essex, though hers features a low cut [[strapless dress|strapless]] [[black dress]] [[short dress|short]] with red and white accents and "USS" written vertically. She has a [[blue cloak]] with a closed [[high collar]]. Additionally, she wears [[black thighhighs]] and [[black gloves]].  

Her rigging consists of two full [[flight deck]]s, which split amidships to form four separate flight decks.

title: ticonderoga_(azur_lane)
body:
[[Azur Lane]]'s personification of the aircraft carrier USS [i]Ticonderoga[/i] (CV-14). Character design by [[Tomohiro Kai]], voiced by [[Ichinose Kana]].

She is portrayed with [[very long hair|very long]], pale [[blue hair]], adorned with what looks like a [[bird of paradise flower]] on the left side of her head. Her uniform is much more form-fitting compared to [[Essex (Azur Lane)|Essex]] and her sisters; her clothing emphasizes her [[large breasts]] more, by way of a blue-on-black [[sleeveless shirt]] held together with a pair of belts, and [[clothing cutout| clothing cutouts]] right at her waist area. She also wears a pair of elbow-length [[fingerless gloves]], and a microskirt to complement her [[thighhighs]]; the latter also emphasizes the [[mole]] on the inner side of her left thigh. The only thing she shares with her sisters would be the [[coat cape]].

Her [[rigging]] is an asymmetrical pair of [[flight deck|flight decks]], much like her sister Bunker Hill; but unlike the latter, her right flight deck is straight.

title: siegfried_(fate)
body:
Saber-class Servant in [[Fate/Apocrypha]]. He is the hero portrayed as the main character of the German [[Nibelungenlied]] epic. He has [[long hair|long]], [[blonde hair]] with a set of [[armor]] and his weapon, [[Balmung (fate)|]].

Due to his timid personality and his habit of saying sorry due to him being afraid to offend anyone, he has gained the nickname "Sumanai-san" (Mr. I'm sorry) from the fanbase. In [[Fate/Grand Order]], it is revealed that this habit is the result of his wife [[Kriemhild (fate)|]]'s assertive behavior.

[b]True Name:[/b] Siegfried, the Dragon-Blooded Knight
[b]Memetic name:[/b] [i]"Sumanai-san (Mr. I'm sorry)":[https://web.archive.org/web/20170805115136/https://www.reddit.com/r/grandorder/comments/57h4bg/servant_trivia_6_siegfried_the_strongest_evil/][/i]

title: ariane_yeong
body:
The Gestalt pilot and officer of [[spacecraft|Penrose-512]]. After their ship crashlands on the frozen planet Leng, her [[replika|Replika]] crewmate [[Elster (signalis)|Elster]] goes in search of her throughout Sierpinski.

[Spoiler] It's eventually revealed that Ariane and [[Elster (signalis)|Elster]] are lovers, and that [[Elster (signalis)|Elster's]] search for Ariane is to fulfil an unknown promise the two of them previously made onboard the Penrose. 

It's additionally revealed that Ariane is Bioresonant, and heavily implied that much (if not all) of the games events and story are caused by her bioresonant abilities.

title: replika
body:
A Bio-synthetic [[android]] from the Video Game series [Signalis] created through the use off Bioreasonance that consists of Bio-synthetic/organic components and robotic implants to serve the Eusan Nation with a cloned bio-synthetic brain pattered after the template of a human donor, described in the series as "biomechanical, synthetic culture-based reproduction of a Gestalt (Human) Template". Replika are created by copying the neural pattern of a Gestalt by a Bioresonant technician. Template memories are suppressed, but their skills are kept intact to preserve the Replika's predictability and productivity. Gestalts chosen by AEON to serve as a neural pattern are permanently cryogenically preserved and erased from public memory to serve Eusan Nation as an "incorruptible ideal".

Replika Units are classified by a four-letter acronym that describes their role, and are named after birds.

title: android
body:
A [[robot]] that looks human, or very nearly human, with a fully human face.

They may appear male, female, or [[androgynous]]. Female androids, also known as gynoids, are the most common in anime. Androids often have small robotic appendages or markings to make it apparent they are not human. The most common of these are [[robot ears]], [[robot joints]], [[mechanical wings]], and attached [[cable]]s.

The difference between a [[humanoid robot]] and an [[android]] is that an android looks mostly human, usually having something resembling skin (though it needn't be skin-colored) and a fully human face, while a humanoid robot is clearly non-human, with a non-human face.

This tag should not be used if the character looks completely human, with no visible robotic traits. Tag what you see, not what you know.

Not to be confused with [[cyborg]], which is a person augmented with mechanical body parts.

h4. Examples

* !post #7999269: [[Sinclair (project moon)|]] ([[alternate universe]])

title: biblically_accurate_angel
body:
A term from internet vernacular referring to the scary and bizarre [[eldritch abomination|representations]] of the [[angel]]s.

The term "biblically accurate" may be misleading, as angels appear infrequently throughout several texts in Judaism and Christianity, and many do appear like the popular depiction of angels. This tag refers to the living creatures described in the Book of Ezekiel and various esoterica, which are terrifying to behold, and tend to have [[extra eyes]] and [[multiple wings]], among other strange features.

Notable types of angels include:
* [[cherub|cherubim]], angels with four heads - human, ox, lion, and bird
* [[ophan|ophanim]], wheels covered in eyes
* [[seraph|seraphim]], angels with many wings - the ones of highest rank

h4. See also

* [[Angel (Evangelion)]]
* [[Galeem]]
* [[WhiteNight (project moon)|]]
* [[Zero Two (Kirby)]]

title: touhouken_bunroku_(game)
body:
Touhouken Bunroku (東方見文録) is a text based adventure game, released for the Famicom by Natsume as a Japanese exclusive. It focuses on a troublemaker known as [[Touhouken Bunroku]], whom travels to the times of famous explorer Marco Polo and ends up altering story.

The title of the game is a play on 東方見聞録 (The Travels of Marco Polo) with alters the fourth character so as to make the title nonsensical.

title: cross-section
body:
This tag is used primarly for two things:

* For the neutral/common meaning of cross-section, such as post #462991;
* For when the act of [[sex]] is shown in a separate frame to show the internal anatomy of the participant(s). For example, a depiction of [[vaginal]] intercourse where the vagina, cervix, and uterus are visible.

Use [[x-ray]] instead of this tag for when the internal anatomy is visible through the body as if by x-ray vision, as opposed to being drawn in a separate frame.


h4. See Also

* [[internal cumshot]]
* [[stomach bulge]]

title: cervical_penetration
body:
Penetration of the [[cervix]]. Usually a [[cross-section]]al or [[x-ray]] view of the [[penis]] penetrating the cervix in an [[internal cumshot]]. Almost impossible to perform and would be excruciatingly painful in reality. 

h4. See also

title: stomach_bulge
body:
A visible protrusion of the stomach caused when something (usually a [[penis]], [[tentacles]], etc.) pushes against the stomach from the inside.  Like [[cervical penetration]], it is impossible to occur in reality without fatal damage.

If the bulging of the stomach is caused by the stomach filling up with something (usually a fluid), it is called [[inflation]].

h4. See also

* [[deep penetration]]
* [[full stomach]]
* [[intestines filled]]
* [[large insertion]]

title: sonic_youth
body:
[b]Sonic Youth[/b] were an [[united_states|American]] rock band formed in [[New York City]] in 1981. Founding members "Kim Gordon":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kim_Gordon (bass, vocals, guitar), "Thurston Moore":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thurston_Moore (lead guitar, vocals) and "Lee Ranaldo":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_Ranaldo (rhythm guitar, vocals) remained together for the entire history of the band, while Steve Shelley (drums) followed a series of short-term drummers in 1985, rounding out the core line-up. Jim O'Rourke (bass, guitar, keyboards) was also a member of the band from 1999 to 2005, and Mark Ibold (bass, guitar) was a member from 2006 to 2011.

Sonic Youth originally emerged from the punk and experimental no wave art and music scene in New York before evolving into a more conventional rock band and becoming a prominent member of the American noise rock scene. 

The band has been praised for having "redefined what rock guitar could do" using a wide variety of unorthodox guitar tunings while preparing guitars with objects like drumsticks and screwdrivers to alter the instruments' timbre. They were a pivotal influence on the alternative and indie rock movements of the 80s, 90s and beyond.

After gaining a large underground following and critical praise through releases with SST Records in the late 1980s, the band experienced mainstream success throughout the 1990s and 2000s after signing to major label DGC in 1990 and headlining the 1995 Lollapalooza festival. 

Sonic Youth disbanded in 2011 following the separation and subsequent divorce of Gordon and Moore, with their final live shows taking place in [[Brazil]]. The members have since asserted that the band is finished and will not reunite.

h4. Partial Discography
* [[goo_(album)|Goo]] (1990)
* [[dirty_(album)|Dirty]] (1992)
* [[washing_machine_(album)|Washing Machine]] (1995)

title: aurora_execution
body:
Ultimate technique of the [[Gold Saint]] [[aquarius degel|of]] [[aquarius camus|Aquarius]] from [[Saint Seiya]].

The user clasps their hands together and raises their arms high above their heads, the illusion of the water bearer holding a vase forming behind them. They then lower their [[outstretched arms|arms outstretched]] towards their opponent, blasting them with a [[cryokinesis|freezing wind]] that slows down all atoms to temperatures approaching absolute zero.

[spoilers][[Cygnus Hyouga]] masters the technique, surpassing and killing his master, Camus, with a blast of true absolute zero during the Twelve Temples arc in the original anime and manga.[/spoilers]

title: diarmuid_ua_duibhne_(fate)
body:
Servant appearing in [[Fate/Zero]] and [[Fate/Grand Order]]. He is summonable in to two different classes, Lancer and Saber.

Based on "the character from the Ulster cycle":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diarmuid_Ua_Duibhne, he was a knight who possessed a [[mole|beauty mark]] which could enchant women, resulting in [[Fionn mac Cumhaill (fate/grand order)|]]'s betrothed [[Grainne (fate)|]] asking to elope with him. This story would later become the basis for the story of [[Lancelot (fate/zero)|]] and [[Guinevere (fate)|]].

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Takeuchi Takashi]] ([[Fate/Zero]]), [[azuazuazu19]] ([[Fate/Grand Order]]), [[Azusa (hws)|]] (Saber)
[b]Voice Actor:[/b] [[Midorikawa Hikaru]]

title: m4_sherman
body:
The [b]M4 Sherman[/b] (named for the [[American Civil War]] General [[William Tecumseh Sherman]]) was the primary [[tank]] used by the U.S. during [[World War II|World War II]]. Tall, fast, versatile, moderately armored, with a sloped glacis and a rounded turret housing a 75mm or 76mm gun, the reliable M4 saw worldwide use in both the Pacific (where it excelled) and the European theaters of the war.

While the tank proved to be quite superior against the light armor used by the [[Imperial Japanese Army]] in the Pacific, the much heavier and potent tanks of the German [[Wehrmacht]] became very dangerous foes for the Sherman, which was even nicknamed "The Tin Coffin" or "The Coffin on Tracks" by American crews operating it in the European theater. 

Nevertheless, its superior numbers and the fact that it was very easy to produce (in vast numbers), maintain, repair and modify (European crews eventually added extra armor and more potent anti-tank armament) proved crucial for the American war effort and made the Sherman tank a very successful combat machine design in the end.

More extensive modifications undertaken during the [[Cold War]] - specifically, the fitment of the [[AMX-13]]'s turret and gun on the M4 chassis by Egypt, and the addition of more powerful engines and a tweaked 105mm F1 gun taken from the [[AMX-30]] by Israel (the later receiving the designation of M-51 or Super Sherman) gave the old design a new lease of life decades after its retirement, proving the tank's capabilities could be expanded much further beyond its original specifications.

h4. Some variants

* [[M4A3E2 Jumbo]]
* [[M4A3E8]] "Easy Eight"
* [[Sherman Firefly]]
* [[T34 Calliope]]
* [[Super Sherman]]

h4. See also

title: super_sherman
body:
The Sherman M-50 and Sherman M-51, both known abroad as the "Super Sherman", are heavily modified variants of the [[M4 Sherman]] tank used by the [[Israel Defense Forces]] from the 1950s to 1970s. They were armed with a high-velocity 75mm (M-50) or 105mm (M-51) main gun imported from France.

The Super Shermans saw use in several conflicts, including the 1956 invasion of the Sinai, the 1967 Six-Day War, and the 1973 Yom Kippur War. They were gradually phased out of use during the late 1970s and 80s, often sold to friendly partners, and some captured Super Shermans were used against Israeli troops during the 1982 Invasion of Lebanon.  

h4. External links

* Wikipedia: "Super Sherman":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_Sherman

title: t34_calliope
body:
A variant of the [[M4 Sherman]] tank with rocket tubes mounted atop the turret, turning it into an armored rocket launcher. Intended to serve as bunker-busters for [[D-Day]], the Calliope did see some limited action in the Western European front of [[World War II]] in 1944 and 1945.

body:
The fourth [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[Pochimaru (vtuber)|]]. This form was defined by Pochi herself as the form she would appear in for casual streams, while relegating her last form to active gaming streams.

She is portrayed in a [[mature female|starkly mature form]] with [[long hair|long]] [[grey hair|grey]] [[tentacle hair]], [[black wings|black]] [[head wings]], a [[mole under mouth]], red [[teardrop facial mark]] and a [[large breasts|sizable bust]]. The costume consists of a [[black hat]], [[long hair|long]] [[white dress]] with a [[side slit]] and [[cleavage cutout]], [[black cape]], cryptid walking [[cane]], [[bandaged leg|bandages on her left thigh]], and [[white sandals]].

title: luigi_(golf)
body:
An [[official alternate costume]] for [[Luigi]] throughout the [[Mario Golf]] series and in [[Mario Kart Tour]]. Depicted wearing a [[green shirt]] with a [[white collar]], [[short sleeves]], a [[zipper]] and a [[pocket]] along with [[white pants]], a [[blue belt]], [[white shoes|white]] [[sneakers]]. Also wears a [[green hat|green]] [[visor cap]] and a [[single glove|single]] [[white gloves|white glove]].

The [[Mario Kart Tour]] version has him wearing a pair of [[green overalls|green]] [[two-tone overalls|and]] [[white overalls|white]] [[vertical-striped overalls]] over a [[blue shirt]] with a [[star print]] on it. Also wears an [[orange shoes|orange]] version of his usual [[shoes]], his usual [[white gloves]], and a [[baseball cap]] that matches his overalls.

title: hizuki_miu
body:
[[Indie virtual YouTuber|Independent]] [[virtual youtuber]]. Former member from [[WACTOR production|WACTOR]]'s first unit "Mirais".

h4. Appearance

She has [[green eyes]] and [[long hair|long]] [[white hair|white]] or [[grey hair|grey]] hair arranged in a [[side ponytail]] with a [[green bow|green]] [[hair bow]] or [[hair ribbon]]. Often wears [[cat ears]] or a [[triangle hair ornament]].

As an indie, she has white [[medium hair]], with [[aqua hair|aqua]] [[colored inner hair]].

h4. Costumes

1st and 2nd costumes designed by [[Takehana Note]]; 3rd one by [[Toma_(norishio)|Coburina Toma]]; 4th one by [[touyou_(39kir)|Touyou]].

Her first outfit (post #5032455), consists of a [[white shirt|white]] and [[black shirt|black]] [[sleeveless shirt]], a [[black skirt|black]] [[pleated skirt]], white [[arm warmers]], and [[white thighhighs]].

Her second outfit (post #4853524) consists of a white [[collared shirt]] with [[triangle print|triangle prints]], a [[multicolored vest|multicolored]] [[green_vest|green]] and [[black vest]] with [[gold trim|gold trims]], a [[green necktie]] with a [[triangle]] ornament, a black pleated skirt, and white thighhighs and a [[thigh strap]].

Her third outfit (post #4957620) consists of an [[aqua jacket|aqua]] [[cropped jacket]] with [[frilled jacket|frills]], [[puffy long sleeves]] and a [[hooded jacket|hood]], a [[black sports bra]], [[black panties|black]] [[highleg panties]], [[white shorts|white]] [[short shorts]], [[aqua thighhighs]] and [[aqua footwear|aqua]] [[sneakers]].

Her fourth outfit (post #7369239) consists of an [[aqua shirt|aqua]] [[cropped shirt]], an [[aqua jacket|aqua]] [[cropped jacket]], a [[white skirt]] wih a [[black belt]], worn over a [[white one-piece swimsuit]]. title: humboldt_penguin_(kemono_friends)
body: A [i][[Kemono Friends]][/i] character. She is one of many "Friends" in Japari Park. Part of [[penguins_performance_project_(kemono_friends)|Penguins Performance Project]] as "Hululu". She is typically presented as an airhead with a bottomless stomach, and is usually seen munching on a [[Japari Bun]] when idle. Hululu wears a black and white jacket patterned after a Humboldt penguin's speckled plumage, with sleeves ending in mittens as to evoke flippers. The earpieces of her headphones bear a pattern evoking the eyes of the actual penguin. As the bottom of her coat covers her lower half, she [[no_pants|appears to wear no bottoms]], though she may wear something similar to [[emperor_penguin_(kemono_friends)|Emperor Penguin]]'s leotard underneath. She has short black hair with some bangs being tipped pink; her center bangs feature two white spots. As her design bears numerous similarities to that of her bandmate [[Gentoo Penguin (Kemono Friends)|]] (Gean), the two are sometimes mixed up by taggers. While one should be conscious of artistic liberties and stylistic differences, some reliable distinguishing details to check for include: * hair length (Hululu has shoulder-length hair, Gean's extends past her ribcage) * default outfit (Gean has a ruffled skirt; Hululu doesn't wear one, and her lower half is covered by her long jacket. Additionally, Gean's jacket has a black collar with pull-cords; Hululu has a white collar with no cords.) * default headphones (Hululu's headband is obscured by her hair at the top; Gean's is fully visible. Additionally, the design on Hululu's earpiece makes a "ç" shape, where Gean's makes a fully-closed ring.) * bangs (Gean has red streaks (sometimes depicted as a red-pink) on the sides of her center bang, usually depicted from the middle to the tip. Hululu has light pink patches on the bangs flanking the top of her center bang; her center bang just has two white dots.) In 2021, a [[virtual YouTuber]] based on Hululu debuted under the franchise's [[Kemono Friends V Project|KemoV Project]] label as one of its founding members, alongside [[African Penguin (Kemono Friends)|African Penguin]]. This Humboldt Penguin is a soft-spoken and easygoing girl, generally preferring to hold chatting streams and play relaxed games such as [[Minecraft]]. A nostalgia-lover, familiar with retro music and media. h4. See also * [[Grape-kun]] * [[Humboldt penguin]] h4. External links * "Humboldt Penguin (KemoV)'s YouTube channel":https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmYO-WfY7Tasry4D1YB4LJw * "Humboldt Penguin (KemoV)'s Twitter":https://twitter.com/Hululu_KEMOV

title: lotus_land_story
body:
東方幻想郷 ("Touhou Gensoukyou") ~ Lotus Land Story
("Fantastic Home Village of the East")

Fourth game of the [[Touhou]] series, released 14 August 1998. Part of the [[Touhou (PC-98)|PC-98]] era of Touhou games.

A sudden influx of youkai drove [[Hakurei Shrine]] [[miko]] [[Hakurei Reimu]] to climb high above the mountains behind her shrine to a suspicious lake she believes to be the source of the [[traditional youkai]] — only to be joined by her former enemy [[Kirisame Marisa (PC-98)|]].

h4. Characters

h6. Playable

* [[Hakurei Reimu (PC-98)]]
* [[Kirisame Marisa (PC-98)]]

h6. Enemies

* Stage 1 Boss: [[orange_(touhou)|Orange]]
* Stage 2 Boss: [[kurumi_(touhou)|Kurumi]]
* Stage 3 Boss: [[Elly (touhou)|]]
* Stage 4 Midboss: [[Rengeteki_(touhou)|Rengeteki]]
* Stage 4 Boss (Reimu Route): Kirisame Marisa
* Stage 4 Boss (Marisa Route): Hakurei Reimu
* Stage 5/Final Stage Boss: [[Kazami Yuuka]]
* Extra Stage Bosses: [[Mugetsu (touhou)|]] and [[Gengetsu (touhou)|]]

h4. External links

* "Touhou Wiki: Lotus Land Story":http://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Lotus_Land_Story

title: unika_(guilty_gear)
body:
[[Guilty Gear]] character first introduced in [[Guilty Gear Strive: Dual Rulers]], later debuting as a playable character on May 27, 2025.

Unika is a half-Gear hybrid who originates from a future timeline where an anti-Gear virus causes all infected Gears to go berserk. She has a hatred of Gears and believes they need to be eliminated for the sake of humanity.

She becomes close with [[Bridget (guilty gear)|]] after she helps Unika fix her jacket following a fight with [[sin kiske|Sin]] and they bond about their identity struggles.

h4. Appearance

* !post #9372009

Unika has an [[androgynous]] appearance, having short black hair with a blue streak and red eyes. She wears a particularly unique-looking pair of white [[goggles]]. In game, she swaps her goggles for a helmet.

h4. External links

* "Guilty Gear Wiki: Unika":https://guiltygear.wiki.gg/wiki/Unika

title: brian_o'conner
body:
One of the main characters of the [[Fast & Furious]] series, a former LAPD officer and FBI agent.

A skilled driver and mechanic with a passion for street racing since his youth; he was once rivals with [[Dominic Toretto]] before eventually forming a brotherly bond with him, as well as marrying his sister, Mia Toretto and having a kid with her named Jack. He is also childhood friends with Roman Pearce.

He often prefers Japanese cars such as the [[Toyota Supra]] [[toyota_supra_mk_iv|Mk IV]], [[Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution]] and his iconic [[nissan_skyline_r34|R34]] [[nissan_skyline|Nissan Skyline]] [[nissan_skyline_gt-r|GT-R]]. 

His actor, Paul Walker, was also a car lover, with his favorite Japanese cars being the Skyline, [[Nissan Silvia S15|Silvia S15]], and the [[nissan_fairlady_z|Fairlady Z]]. The white Supra used in the side-by-side with Dom in the [[the_last_ride_(furious_7)|final]] scene of [[Furious 7]] was also owned by Paul.

Since Paul Walker's passing in late 2013, his character leaves the story after Furious 7, as Brian had decided to live a peaceful life with his family.

title: gibson_sg
body:
Solid body [[electric guitar]] made and manufactured by American [[instrument]] maker [[gibson_brands_inc|Gibson]]. Used by famous musicians such as [[AC/DC]]'s [[Angus Young]], [[Frank Zappa]] and [[Radiohead (band)|Radiohead]]'s Thom Yorke.

Among anime and anime-themed characters, [[nitroplus]]'s [[Super Sonico]] and [[Angel Beats!]]'s [[yui_(angel_beats!)|Yui]] are the most prominent.

Common visual traits of the SG include a short and round double-cutaway body, four control knobs, double humbucker setup and a tune-o-matic bridge with stopbar, with certain models (specially earlier) sporting a tailpiece instead.

h4. See Also

* [[Gibson ES-335]]

title: dia_de_muertos
body:
"The Day of the Dead"

A traditional [[mexico|Mexican]] multi-day holiday occurring on November 1 and 2, though other days, such as October 31 or November 6, may be included depending on the locality, focuses on the gatherings of family and friends to pray for and remember friends and family members who have died, and help support their spiritual journey. Based on the ancient [[Aztec]] festival dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl.

h4. Related tags

title: shera_l._greenwood
body:
One of the main characters of [i][[Isekai Maou to Shoukan Shoujo no Dorei Majutsu]][/i].

Shera L. Greenwood is the princess of the Greenwood Kingdom. Eventually leaving her homeland after her brother Keera, wishes to use her to expand the bloodline. She and [[Rem Galeu]] later attempted to summon a [[Diablo (Isekai Maou)|demon lord]] via a ritual, the two becoming the demon lord's slave.

She is a youthful female [[elf]] with [[blonde hair]] that is also [[braid|braided]] and [[large breasts]]. Her outfit consists of a [[green dress]] with an [[o-ring|O-shaped ring]] exposing her [[cleavage]] and yellow hem, a pair of long [[white gloves]] and [[thigh boots]].

Voiced by [[Serizawa Yuu]]

title: mikoto_freesia_scarlet_(goma)
body:
Daughter of Flandre Scarlet ([[ Flan-Maman (Goma)]]) and Gomasamune's [[admiral (kancolle)|KanColle Admiral]]

[quote]
From gomasamune's artist commentary:

Full name is Mikoto Freesia Scarlet 
After contemplating about which name to use, I ended up using both (lol)

Mikoto, written in kanji as (命). 
The name means life, because she's a new life who is born from both of them.

Her middle name Freesia is the flower of her birth (leap year). 
The meaning of Freesia is Purity and Innocence.

By the way, the birth stone of Febuary 11th is Sardonix. 
The meaning is "Happyness for husband and wife"

I'll write more about the other details of her character design when I'm into the mood for it.
[/quote]

title: amagase_touma
body:
* Voiced by: [[terashima takuma|Takuma Terashima]]
* Age: 17
* Personal Song: "BANG×BANG"

Tōma is one of the  idols introduced in [i][[idolmaster_2|The iDOLM@STER 2]][/i]. The leader of "Jupiter", he is a year younger than [[shijou takane|Takane]]. His hobbies are soccer, cooking, and figure collecting. His character image songs, which are shared with the other two members of Jupiter, are "Alice or Guilty" and "Koi o Hajimeyou". In the anime, he slightly admires [[kisaragi chihaya|Chihaya]]'s recovery from the exposure and her singing during Idol Jam. The Idolmaster 2 hints at a potential relationship between him and [[amami haruka|Haruka]].

He and his group are signed onto 315 productions in [i][[idolmaster_side-m|iDOLM@STER Side-M]][/i], becoming one of two main idol groups for the company (the second being [[dramatic stars (idolmaster)| Dramatic Stars]]).

title: jupiter_(idolmaster)
body:
An all-male idol group from the [[Idolmaster]] series, also known as Project Jupiter. 

Its members are [[Amagase Touma]], [[Ijuuin Hokuto]] and [[Mitarai Shouta]].

They were originally signed onto 961 Productions during their debut in [i][[Idolmaster 2|iDOLM@STER 2]][/i], but sign to 315 Productions for their appearance in [i][[idolmaster_side-m|iDOLM@STER: Side-M]][/i].

title: super_marisa_world
body:
Super Marisa World (also stylized as SuperMarisaWorld and sometimes in katakana スーパーマリサワールド) is a [[Touhou]] Project fangame that is a platformer by Double Cluster. It stars [[Kirisame Marisa]] as the only playable character, along with [[Koakuma]] and [[Rumia]] as supporting characters throughout her adventure. The game is a parody to the popular SNES game [[Super Mario World]] (hence the name), but other Mario games are paid homage as well. Like many fangames, it's unknown if ZUN knows about this game.  

h4. External links

* [Touhou Wiki](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Super_Marisa_World)

title: maria_campbell
body:
The protagonist of the game [[otome_game_no_hametsu_flag_shika_nai_akuyaku_reijou_ni_tensei_shite_shimatta|Hamefura]] takes place in. Despite being constanly mistreated and belittled by the cruel and arrogant [[Katarina Claes]], she always successfully conquers the favor of one of the love interests, and at the end of each route Katarina always suffers a gruesome fate.

However, when the reincarnated Katarina takes over, she instead befriends Maria and values her, both due to the goodness in her heart and a fear that crossing Maria will inevitalby result in her death or exile - all the while not realizing that her fate has been plenty changed already.

Voiced by [[Hayami Saori]]

[b]Sekai Saikou no Ansatsusha Isekai Kizoku ni Tensei suru[/b] is a light novel series written by Tsukiyo Rui with illustations by [[Reia]]. It began publishing on February 1, 2019. title: kirby's_dream_land_3
body:
A direct sequel to [[Kirby's Dream Land 2]]. [[Dark Matter (kirby)|]] isn't finished yet. This time, it decides to do a full-scale invasion on [[Planet Popstar]], destroying the planet's rings and taking control of as many of its inhabitants as it can. This isn't very subtle, so it immediately catches the attention of [[Kirby]] and his friend [[Gooey (kirby)|]]. Together with his animal friends (with newcomers [[Chuchu (kirby)|]], [[Nago (kirby)|]], and [[Pitch (kirby)|]]), Kirby and Gooey set out to save the day once again!

title: starship_troopers:_traitor_of_mars
body:
[[Starship Troopers]]: Traitor of Mars is a 2017 Japanese-American adult animated military science fiction film directed by Shinji Aramaki and Masaru Matsumoto and written by Edward Neumeier. The film is a sequel to Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012) and the fifth installment of the Starship Troopers film series. It also marks the return of two original actors; Casper Van Dien reprises his role as Johnny Rico from the first and third films and Dina Meyer reprises her role as Dizzy Flores from the first film.

h4. External Links

* [Wikipedia article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Starship_Troopers:_Traitor_of_Mars)

title: el_chavo_del_ocho
body: [b]El Chavo del Ocho[/b] ("The Kid From The Eight"), often shortened to simply [[El Chavo]] ([i]"The Kid"[/i]), is a classic, very light hearted and very popular comedy sitcom that originally aired on Televisa network, in [[Mexico]], from 1973 to 1980. It also gained enormous popularity in Latin America as well as in [[Brazil]] (known there as [i]"Chaves"[/i]), [[Spain]] and other countries in addition to the Spanish-speaking portion of the [[United States]]. El Chavo was created by comedian "Roberto Gómez Bolaños, a.k.a. Chespirito":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chespirito , who also played the main character. h4. Characters * [[El Chavo]] * [[Don Ramon]] ** [[Chilindrina]] * [[Dona Florinda]] ** [[Quico]] * [[Senor Barriga]] ** [[Nono (el chavo del ocho)|]] * [[Popis]] * [[Profesor Jirafales]] * [[Paty (el chavo del ocho)|]] * [[Godinez]] * [[Jaimito El Cartero]] * [[Dona Clotilde|La Bruja del 71]] h4. See also * [[El Chapulin Colorado]] * [[El Chavo Animado]] h4. External links * "Wikipedia":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/El_Chavo_del_Ocho

title: pol_pot
body:
[[communism|Communist]] dictator of [[Cambodia]] during the 1970s. One of the biggest mass murderers in terms of percentage of population killed (~1/4 of the entire country according to some sources). Attempted to invade Vietnam in 1977, only the Vietnamese counter-invaded and overthrew his regime. He lived the rest of his life in exile, dying in 1998.

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pol_Pot]

title: cathy_huggins
body:
A playable character from [[Black Survival]] & [[Eternal Return: Black Survival]]. A doctor from Canada who participates in Aglaia's experiments on Lumia Island. Due to a bizarre lack of common sense, she has accidentally killed patients before through various malpractices (i.e. incorrect prescriptions). Though she does care for her patients, she is noted to also be incapable of feeling guilt, especially over those who have died because of her.

Has [[dark skin]], [[brown hair]], [[blue eyes]], and [[large breasts]].

h4. Skins

She almost always has her [[hair over one eye]], concealing the eyepatch she  wears over her right eye (which she lost when she was once left for dead). title: dijeh
body:
A fictional [[mecha]] from the [[Gundam]] mechaverse. It first appeared in the [[Zeta Gundam]] TV anime series from 1985.

[b]MSK-008 Dijeh[/b]

A competent and powerful ground combat [[mobile_suit|MS]] developed by the [[AEUG|Karaba]] resistance organization on Earth by using a heavily modified AEUG [[Rick Dias]], during The Gryps War against the brutal and oppresive [[titans_(gundam)|Titans]]. While its visor might resemble a monoeye, it has a [[rx-78-2 gundam|Gundam]]-esque faceplate underneath it. The Dijeh's profile is similar to that of the old [[Gelgoog]] MS and is armed with a [[beam rifle]] and a [[beam naginata]] as well.

One unit was piloted by [[Amuro Ray]] during [[zeta_Gundam|the Gryps Conflict]], and many of them were deployed with degrees of success by PMCs in [[gundam_narrative|UC 0097]] - a full 10 years after its introduction, a testament to its effectiveness in MS combat.

h4. See also
* [[Rick Dijeh]]
* [[Rick Dijeh Kai]]
* [[Dijeh SE-R]]
* [[Char's Dijeh]]
* [[Dijeh Traversia]]

title: ironmouse_(witch)
body:
The 20th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[VShojo]]'s [[Ironmouse]].

Dressing up as a [[witch]] for [[Halloween]], she now wears a [[black hat|black]] [[witch hat]], a [[black dress|black]] [[frilled dress]], a [[black capelet]], [[black socks]] and [[black shoes]].

She has 2 different [[official alternate hairstyle|hairstyles]] in this costume:
* [[Long hair|Long]] [[pink hair|pink]] and [[purple hair|purple]] [[streaked hair]] where her hair is [[hair over shoulder|over her shoulder]]
* Long pink and purple streaked hair done in [[twintails]]

h4. Appearance

* !post #8258331: Profile
* !post #8378667: Merchandise

title: zentreya_(witch)
body:
The 10th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[VShojo]]'s [[Zentreya]] and the 2nd for her [[Halloween]] costumes.

Dressing up as a [[witch]] for this years Halloween, Zen now wears a [[black hat|black]] [[witch hat]] with a [[black dress|black]] [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] [[backless dress]] with [[black sleeves|black]] [[detached sleeves]], [[black gloves|black]] [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[elbow gloves]], [[black thighhighs]] and [[black shoes|black]] [[high heels]].

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] in this costume, she has [[long hair|long]] [[curly hair|curly]] [[grey hair]] with an [[ahoge]].

Unlike her other models where she has [[red eyes|red]] or [[yellow eyes]], in this costume her eyes are colored as [[aqua eyes|aqua]].

h4. Appearance

title: manhunt
body:
[b]Manhunt[/b] is a 2003 [[PlayStation 2]] mature stealth action game made by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. Set in the same universe in the [[Grand Theft Auto]] series in the fictional Carcer City, the player takes the role of [[James Earl Cash]], a death row inmate who was supposed to be executed but was secretly saved by a mysterious man known as "[[Lionel Starkweather|the Director]]". However, the Director, who is actually a Snuff Film maker, forces James into his deathly movie where he must travel throughout slums of the city while killing an army of gangs, murderers, cultists, corrupt police and mercenaries hired by the Director to kill James in order to survive and gain his freedom.

Because of the game's brutal gameplay and violent subject matter, which even made some of the developers felt sick, the game has been banned in several countries due to its content. The game later had a sequel, Manhunt 2, in 2007 for the PlayStation 2 and [[Wii]].

title: karaoke
body:
A form of entertainment done by amateur [[singing|singers]] who sing along to pre-recorded instrumental versions of popular songs with the lyrics displayed on a video screen and timed by moving animation.

Etymology: Japanese "clipped compound word":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clipped_compound] meaning "empty orchestra". 

h4. See also

* [[Karaoke box]]
* [[Lyrics]]
* [[Microphone]]
* [[Tag Group:Audio Tags]]

title: scenery
body:
An image that pays special attention to the scene or landscape of its composition, usually favoring it over any [[no humans|characters]] present. 

Relevant images may feature intricate [[cityscape]]s, [[landscape]]s, [[architecture]], [[building]]s, [[nature|natural features]] or even [[ruins]] and [[loaded_interior|finely-detailed]] [[indoors|interiors]], among similar concepts. 

h4. Common elements

* [[architecture]]
** [[ruins]]
* [[indoors]]/[[outdoors]]
* [[loaded interior]]
** [[messy room]]
* [[no humans]]
* [[nature]]
* [[still life]]
* [[wide shot]]
** [[very wide shot]]

h4. Specific focuses

* [[cityscape]]
* [[cloud focus]]
* [[landscape]]
* [[seascape]]
* [[sky focus]]
* [[snowscape]]

title: non-pubic_inmon
body:
A lewd crest that appears as a stylized heart or womb tattoo anywhere other than directly [[pubic tattoo|above the genitals]].

* !post #8366393: The girl on the left has a [[non-pubic inmon]] on her [[tramp stamp|lower back]] while the one on the right has a [[pubic tattoo|pubic inmon]].

title: cat_ear_heart_hands
body: Forming a [[heart]] shape with the hands while having the index fingers slightly lifted to resemble [[cat ears]].
